description: As darkness settles, faint groans drift through the trees. Shadows shift. The dead have caught your scent.

choices.text: Grab weapons and fight off the attackers

success.resultNarration: You hold the line and push the infected back into the night.

failure.resultNarration: The infected swarm the camp. You break free, wounded and shaken.

choices.text: Retreat into hiding places and wait for them to pass

success.resultNarration: The infected shuffle past your hiding place, unaware of your presence.

failure.resultNarration: One of them sniffs too close—you're forced to bolt, narrowly escaping harm.

choices.text: Slip away silently into the dark and abandon the camp

success.resultNarration: You slip away into the dark, losing your camp but avoiding the undead.

failure.resultNarration: A loose branch snaps underfoot. The horde turns. You barely make it out.

description: Whispers and footsteps circle the camp. Raiders have found you.

success.resultNarration: You repel the raiders after a desperate exchange.

failure.resultNarration: Gunfire erupts. You retreat wounded as the raiders scatter your supplies.

choices.text: Try to negotiate or stall them

success.resultNarration: You talk the raiders down enough for them to leave without bloodshed.

failure.resultNarration: The raiders laugh off your attempt and push in aggressively.

choices.text: Escape into the night and abandon your camp

success.resultNarration: You fade into the darkness before the raiders notice you're gone.

failure.resultNarration: You trip on uneven ground as you flee, twisting your ankle.

description: Low growls echo in the darkness. A stray dog prowls near your camp, hungry and unpredictable.

choices.text: Wave torches or tools to scare it away

success.resultNarration: The dog retreats into the shadows, startled by your noise.

failure.resultNarration: It snaps at you before retreating. A shallow bite stings painfully.

choices.text: Toss a small piece of food to distract it

success.resultNarration: The dog snatches the food and vanishes quietly.

failure.resultNarration: The dog ignores the food and circles even closer.

choices.text: Stay quiet and wait for it to lose interest

success.resultNarration: After a tense minute, the dog wanders away.

failure.resultNarration: It growls and scratches at your pack before leaving.

description: A violent storm erupts overhead. Branches snap and the wind howls against your shelter.

success.resultNarration: The shelter holds. You weather the storm, though sleep is impossible.

failure.resultNarration: A branch collapses onto you in the dark. You suffer a nasty blow.

choices.text: Stay low and hope the shelter holds

success.resultNarration: The storm rages but eventually passes.

failure.resultNarration: Wind tears part of the shelter loose, battering you with debris.

choices.text: Dart to a sturdier-looking tree or rock formation

success.resultNarration: You make it to better cover and ride out the storm.

failure.resultNarration: You slip on wet ground while relocating.
